Platform.Name: XForms
Platform.CommonDescription: Note: This package needs to be installed in all Xamarin.Forms projects (PCL, Android, iOS and UWP).

Project.Name: Licensing
Project.Title: Syncfusion Licensing for .NET
Project.Description:
Syncfusion licensing is a .NET library for validating the registered Syncfusion license in an application at runtime. The Syncfusion license must be registered in an application when using the Syncfusion evaluation build or NuGet package assemblies.
Documentation: https://help.syncfusion.com/common/essential-studio/licensing/license-key?utm_source=nuget&utm_medium=listing
Support: Incident: https://www.syncfusion.com/support/directtrac/incidents/newincident?utm_source=nuget&utm_medium=listing Forum: https://www.syncfusion.com/forums/general?utm_source=nuget&utm_medium=listing

Project.Name: PresentationRenderer
Project.Title: Syncfusion PowerPoint to PDF and image conversion library for Xamarin
Project.Description: This package provides the functionality to utilize the features of Syncfusion Xamarin PowerPoint Slide to PDF/Image converter and more.

Project.Name: SkiaSharpHelper
Project.Title: Syncfusion SkiaSharp Helper for Xamarin
Project.Description:
Syncfusion SkiaSharp Helper is a .NET Standard library that provides GDI+ equivalent APIs to achieve the rendering support in Xamarin platforms.
Key features:
GDI+ equivalent classes and rendering methods (i.e. Graphics, GraphicsPath, etc.)
Note: This package needs to be installed in all Xamarin.Forms projects (PCL/.NET Standard, Android, iOS, and UWP).
Support: Incident: https://www.syncfusion.com/support/directtrac/incidents/newincident?utm_source=nuget&utm_medium=listing Forum: https://www.syncfusion.com/forums/xamarin.forms?utm_source=nuget&utm_medium=listing
